alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:24PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lander and northwestern Nye Counties through 300 PM PDT... At 224 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northeast of Gabbs, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Berlin Ichthyosaur SP and Ione. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
